lead_paragraph: Based on the unforgettable story "Jolene: A Life" by one of America's most celebrated writers, E.L. Doctorow (Ragtime, Billy Bathgate), Jolene is the provocative tale of a young girl who, after surviving a series of abusive foster homes, marries a l
